articles.author: Olesya Dmitracova, Anna Cooban, Juliana Liu, Michael Nam
articles.title: McDonald’s stores hit by global IT failure - CNN
articles.description: McDonald’s was hit by a system failure Friday that closed restaurants and disrupted online and app orders around the world, including in the United States, Australia, Japan, Hong Kong, and the United Kingdom.
articles.content:
London/Hong Kong/New YorkCNN
  — 
McDonalds was hit by a system failure Friday that closed restaurants and disrupted online and app orders around the world, including in the United States, Australi… [+2750 chars]
